origin.sourceService: Define if layertype is from LAPIG ('internal') or service consumed from other Server ('external')
origin.url: url of the consumed service. must contain {x} {y} {z} for 'xyz' or .xml if 'wmts' (capabilities)
origin._comment: IGNORE THIS. The URL for xyz must be informed in this form: https://source-domain.com/SERVICE/ADDRESS/{{filters.value_filter}}/{z}/{x}/{y}.png
origin.epsg: if 'sourceService' is 'external', then type of EPSG, should be 'transformed' to 4674 in front-end

value_type: Name of the layer in Mapserver
type: Declare type of group layer: 'layer', 'basemap' or 'limit'. Default: 'layer'
typeLayer: Declare type of Layer: vectorial or raster
viewValueType: Can be directly assigned (Ex. 'Planet'), or inform 'translate' which should be declared with property the same name used in 'value' in client/locales/pt-en.json inside descriptor_labels.groups.'group_id'.layers.'id'.label_layer.types.'value'.viewValueType.
typeLabel: Label of Type in Layer. Values: 'type', 'quantity', 'source', 'area_planted', 'production'
filterLabel: Label of filter in Layer. Values: 'type', 'quantity', 'source', 'area_planted', 'production'
columnsCSV: List of csv Columns to export in the form of String array ['year', 'cd_geocmu']
filterSelected: value of array of filters selected.

filters._observations: if layer is external, then 'value_filter' must be the layername from external services. See '_comment' in 'origin' property
filters.value_filter: filter applied in the layertype. Ex 'year=2020'
filters.viewValueFilter: Show direct value or inform 'translate' to search in labels.layertype[layer_value].filter[filter_value].Viewvalue

download.layername: NonObrigatory value of the layertypename used to download data, if not informed the valueType is set. Use when you want download other layer than the valueType.

wfsMapCard.show: true or false. Whether display or not the MapCard
wfsMapCard.columns: Columns on Layertype of Mapserver to display on Card when clicking on a Map (ex. cd_geocmu,area_ha,classe)

galleryAddress: Path to folder where the images are stored, mapped on env.PLATAFORMS_FOLDER
